Title: Journey into Night
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created for television by), Lisa Joy (created for television by), Lisa Joy, Roberto Patino, Michael Crichton (based on the film written by), Gina Atwater (staff writer)
Actors: Evan Rachel Wood, Thandie Newton, Jeffrey Wright, James Marsden
Plot: The hosts revolt against the guests while searching for a new purpose; Maeve sets out to find her daughter with some unexpected help.
